mapper.select: select distinct m.id , m.parent_id, m.name, m.url, m.perms,m.`type`,m.icon,m.order_num,m.gmt_create, m.gmt_modified from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id =ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.type in(0,1) order by m.order_num
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id=#{userId} and m.perms is not null

select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where find_in_set(#{url},m.url) !=0 and m.perms is not null

select DISTINCT(srm.menu_id) srm_menu ,sm.* FROM sys_user_role ur INNER JOIN sys_role sr on ur.role_id=sr.id INNER JOIN sys_role_menu srm on srm.role_id=sr.id INNER JOIN sys_menu sm on sm.id=srm.menu_id where ur.user_id=#{userId}
